title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.12 - Glossary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.12 - Glossary

State Regulations
(a) Authorized representative. A person or entity seeking access
to records pertaining to a data subject pursuant to a written request by, or
the voluntary written consent of, that data subject. (b) Certification (certify). A statement that the copy is a true copy as attested to, and documented by, the
signature of the records access officer. (c) Data subject. Any
natural person about whom personal information has been collected by an
agency. (d) Personal
information. Any data concerning a data subject which, because of
name, number, symbol, mark or other identifier, can be used to identify that
data subject. (e) Records
access officer. The records access officer or his or her designee
shall be the person from whom records may be obtained as listed in section
604.3
of this Part. (f) Records access appeals
officer. The Counsel for the Office for People With Developmental

Disabilities. (g) Record. Any item, collection or grouping of personal
information about a data subject which is maintained and is retrievable by use
of the name or other identifier of the data subject. The term record shall not
include personal information not used to make a determination about a data
subject such as: (1)
a telephone book or
directory; (2)
a card catalog, book
or other resource material in any library; (3)
a compilation of information containing
names and addresses used exclusively for mailing agency information; (4)
personal information required by law to
be maintained, and required by law to be used, only for statistical research or
reporting purposes; (5)
correspondence files; and
(6)
information requested by OPWDD which is necessary to answer unsolicited
requests by the data subject for information. (h) System of records. Any
group of records under the actual or constructive control of OPWDD pertaining
to one or more data subjects from which personal information is retrievable by
use of the name or other identifier of a data subject. Notes

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
